article.title: Adding comments to your laravel application
article.author: Mario Bašić
article.excerpt: I've received an email yesterday letting me know that someone has created a YouTube video about my package laravelista/comments.

authors.bio: Author of the book: “A Collection of Laravel Tutorials”. Cofounder of Go Visit and Visit Murter information tourist portal. Creator of open-source projects.
